examples.example: 当我正在努力思考的时候，这时候灵感突然就涌现了出来。

translate.english: When I was thinking hard, at this time the inspiration suddenly emerged.

examples.example: 在大家都感到困惑的时候，这时候老师站出来耐心地为我们答疑解惑。

translate.english: When everyone felt confused, at this time the teacher came forward and patiently answered our questions and cleared our doubts.

examples.example: 当我们遇到困难的时候，这时候朋友总会及时伸出援手给予帮助。

translate.english: When we encounter difficulties, at this time friends will always extend a helping hand in time to give help.
